text: and took all the treasures of the house of the Lord, and the treasures of the king's house, and the golden spears which David took out of the hand of the sons of Adrazaar king of Suba, and brought them into Jerusalem, even all that he took, and the 14. 26 Gr. arms.golden shields which Solomon had made, [14. 26 the remainder of this verse (here shown in italics) is not in Heb. or Alex.and carried them away into Egypt.]
